title: thick italic cursive/curly font
content:
i didn’t see this forum before i posted elsewhere...but i’m guessing it will be more helpful here. so i want to know the name of this cursive-y font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105714im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2j3s486_4766.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105714im_/http:/typophile.com/files/23ix7bk_3720.png)
